name: Slingshot Hero VR
description:
Slingshot Hero VR was originally designed as an event VR game. After receiving tremendous feedback from players, it is now available as a full release game. Grab your slingshot and start shooting in this arcade style throwback to the NES era. With full 360° tracking, beautiful scenery, immersive sounds, and realistic physics, this game is sure to grab your attention and create rivalries between your friends.

- Choose between multiple projectile types
- Race against the clock to achieve the highest score you can
- Find all the hidden objects
- Realistic slingshot motions
- Persistent high score tracking to compete with friends
- Playable both with OR without VR hardware
